verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of Solomon.) Give <S%H5414><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> Thy judgments, <S%H4941><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> And Thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to the king's son. <S%H1121><s%>
May he judge <S%H1777><s%> Thy people <S%H5971><s%> with righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> And Thine afflicted <S%H6041><s%> with justice. <S%H4941><s%>
Let the mountains <S%H2022><s%> bring <S%H5375><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> And the hills <S%H1389><s%> in righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

May he vindicate <S%H8199><s%> the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> Save <S%H3467><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of the needy, <S%H34><s%> And crush <S%H1792><s%> the oppressor. <S%H6231><s%>
Let them fear <S%H3372><s%> Thee while <S%H5973><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> [endures], And as long <S%H6440><s%> as the moon, <S%H3394><s%> throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
May he come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> like rain <S%H4306><s%> upon the mown <S%H1488><s%> grass, Like showers <S%H7241><s%> that water <S%H2222><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

In his days <S%H3117><s%> may the righteous <S%H6662><s%> flourish, <S%H6524><s%> And abundance <S%H7230><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> the moon <S%H3394><s%> is no <S%H1097><s%> more. <S%H1097><s%>
May he also rule <S%H7287><s%> from sea <S%H3220><s%> to sea, <S%H3220><s%> And from the River <S%H5104><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Let the nomads <S%H9478><s%> of the desert <S%H9478><s%> bow <S%H3766><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him; And his enemies <S%H340><s%> lick <S%H3897><s%> the dust. <S%H6083><s%>

Let the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> and of the islands <S%H339><s%> bring <S%H7725><s%> presents; <S%H7725><s%> The kings <S%H4428><s%> of Sheba <S%H7614><s%> and Seba <S%H5434><s%> offer <S%H7126><s%> gifts. <S%H814><s%>
And let all <S%H3605><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> before him, All <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> him.

For he will deliver <S%H5337><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%> when he cries <S%H7768><s%> for help, <S%H7768><s%> The afflicted <S%H6041><s%> also, and him who has <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> helper. <S%H5826><s%>
He will have <S%H2347><s%> compassion <S%H2347><s%> on the poor <S%H1800><s%> and needy, <S%H34><s%> And the lives <S%H5315><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%> he will save. <S%H3467><s%>

He will rescue <S%H1350><s%> their life <S%H5315><s%> from oppression <S%H8496><s%> and violence; <S%H2555><s%> And their blood <S%H1818><s%> will be precious <S%H3365><s%> in his sight; <S%H5869><s%>

So may he live; <S%H2421><s%> and may the gold <S%H2091><s%> of Sheba <S%H7614><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> to him; And let them pray <S%H6419><s%> for him continually; <S%H8548><s%> Let them bless <S%H1288><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long.

May there be abundance <S%H6451><s%> of grain <S%H1250><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> on top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> Its fruit <S%H6529><s%> will wave <S%H7493><s%> like [the cedars of] Lebanon; <S%H3844><s%> And may those from the city <S%H5892><s%> flourish <S%H6692><s%> like vegetation <S%H6212><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

May his name <S%H8034><s%> endure <S%H1961><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> May his name <S%H8034><s%> increase <S%H5125><s%> as long <S%H6440><s%> as the sun <S%H8121><s%> [shines]; And let [men] bless <S%H1288><s%> themselves by him; Let all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> call <S%H833><s%> him blessed. <S%H833><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Who alone <S%H905><s%> works <S%H6213><s%> wonders. <S%H6381><s%>

And blessed <S%H1288><s%> be His glorious <S%H9202><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> And may the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> with His glory. <S%H9202><s%> Amen, <S%H543><s%> and Amen. <S%H543><s%>
The prayers <S%H8605><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jesse <S%H3448><s%> are ended. <S%H3615><s%>
